pullRequest.title: Fixing migration of concepts whith refernces to other concepts
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changed the Migration ResourceSet to always hand back
null for eobjects in referenced resources. This way the linked resources
will remain as proxy objects in the currently migrated concept. procies
are not critical for migration.
Adjusted the ActiveConceptConfigurationElement to correctly link a
concept to existing ones in the repository. Adjustments also consider
uri fragment resolution.
Adjusted the test cases by fixing a bug in the old test case bailing
out to early. Also added new asserts to check if the proxy objects get
correctly linked to existing concepts.
Did some refactoring to get test cases working again


Closes Task #417: Exception when migrating concepts with references

commit.message:
Fixing resolution to linked resources - (Task #417)

- Changed the Migration ResourceSet to always hand back
null for eobjects in referenced resources. This way the linked resources
will remain as proxy objects in the currently migrated concept. procies
are not critical for migration.
- Adjusted the ActiveConceptConfigurationElement to correctly link a
concept to existing ones in the repository. Adjustments also consider
uri fragment resolution.
- Adjusted the test cases by fixing a bug in the old test case bailing
out to early. Also added new asserts to check if the proxy objects get
correctly linked to existing concepts.

---
Task #417: Exception when migrating concepts with references

Improved getCategory in helper - (Task #417)

- The getCategory method now allows to search for a category in the
concept using its FQN. The search uses the last part of the FQN

---
Task #417: Exception when migrating concepts with references

Refactored Test Class hierarchy for concepts - (Task #417)

- Added a new test class for Concept Test Cases
- Refactored code to load concpets
- Prepared TestConcept to also load Maturity Concept

---
Task #417: Exception when migrating concepts with references

Updated Test Concept for testing migration - (Task #417)

- Added new Category to Test Concept with an equation linking to the
maturity concept.
- Updated dependencies into maturity concept
- Added a new version of the test concept to actually test the concept
migrator.

---
Task #417: Exception when migrating concepts with references

Reintroducing timeout for unit tests - (Task #417)

- Got aciidetially removed.

---
Task #417: Exception when migrating concepts with references

Fixed Activation of Concepts and Dependencies - (Task #417)

- Changed process of adding depending concepts. Now based on selection
of concepts rather than cross references to the selection. change was
needed due to new way of loading concepts that need migration.
- Refactored some of the code into ActiveConceptHelper.
- Added test cases for new methods.

---
Task #417: Exception when migrating concepts with references

Merge from Development - (Task #417)

- Merge from Development due to #407 finished and merged on development.

---
Task #417: Exception when migrating concepts with references
